title: nAma dhyAnam
sahitya:
nAma dhyAnam sheidAl pollA nOigaL ozhindiDumE sadAshiva


anupallavi

  kAma dhyAnam sheidE namadu vAzhnNAL muzhuvadum kazhindaduvE shiva


caraNam    hari ayan karuNaiyAl udavu marundu anboDu nambikkai irundAl arundu
tiri manam aDakki rAma dhyAnam sheidhAl Anandam rAma dhyAnam shiva
